trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of toolbar to display.
trans-unit.target: 指定要顯示的工具列型別。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by members such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這類的成員使用這個列舉型別是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A> property of the toolbar to `ToolBarAppearance.Flat` to give the toolbar and its buttons a flat appearance.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A>工具列屬性`ToolBarAppearance.Flat`，提供工具列和其按鈕一般外觀。

trans-unit.source: As the mouse pointer moves over the buttons, their appearance changes to three-dimensional.
trans-unit.target: 當滑鼠指標移到按鈕，其外觀會變更為 3d。

trans-unit.source: Button separators appear as lines rather than spaces between the buttons when the toolbar has a flat appearance.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕分隔符號會顯示為線條，而不是當工具列有平面外觀的按鈕之間的空格。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控制項中，設定某些共用的屬性，並將它加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Delegates are also added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonDropDown> events.
This example assumes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> named `toolBar1` and an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> named `imageList1` have been declared.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>名為`toolBar1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>名為`imageList1`已經宣告。

trans-unit.source: The toolbar and buttons appear flat, but the buttons change to three-dimensional as the mouse pointer moves over them.
trans-unit.target: 工具列和按鈕是平面的，但是按鈕會在滑鼠指標移到上面時變為 3D。

trans-unit.source: The toolbar and buttons appear as standard three-dimensional controls.
trans-unit.target: 工具列和按鈕是標準的 3D 控制項。
